title: Not starting
body:
Hi, I get 
`> open-deep-research@0.0.1 start
> tsx --env-file=.env.local src/run.ts` on start and it exits (on Windows)
author: korzen

comments.body: what environment are you running this in?
You may want to upgrade your Node.js to the latest version or to a version that supports dotenv out of the box.
OK, it worked! However I see that the code is hardcoded to o3-mini and, for some reason, I don't have access to it in  OpenAI's API.

satisfaction_conditions: Ensures compatibility with the user's Node.js environment
Resolves silent failures during application initialization
